data.name: Robotpencil Presents: Character Design - Realistic Believable
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


#label_about_the_series

This tutorial is about how to paint realistically. We will go through the paintings and figure out how and what makes things believable. This contains 45+ minutes of video and PSD file.
data.about_the_game: This tutorial is about how to paint realistically. We will go through the paintings and figure out how and what makes things believable. This contains 45+ minutes of video and PSD file.
data.short_description: This tutorial teaches you how to paint realistically.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
